//notes: can store a large amount of primers in the plastic container, but this functionality is not implemented
description: A spring-powered tool to extract primers from centerfire casings, both live and spent, by Frankford Arsenal.  Usable for anything between .20 and .338 Lapua, including pistol casings.

notes: we assume that the more-precise dimensions belong to the item, though it could just as likely be that of the package, since the package is easier to measure precisely
